name: Wolf's Gravestone
desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

values.desc: Increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>25%</color>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>35%</color>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

Increases ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
